{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Poison bolts | class = PoisonBolts | game = Strife | doomednum = 115 | convid = 185, 179, 183 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→PoisonBolts
A quiver of poisoned bolts for the [[Classes:StrifeCrossbow2|crossbow]]. The [[Classes:PoisonBolt|projectile]] instantly kills any non-boss bleeding actor. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR PoisonBolts : {{Class|Ammo}} { +{{Flag|FLOORCLIP}} {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 10 {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount}} 25 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackAmount}} 2 {{Property|Ammo.BackpackMaxAmount}} 50 {{Property|Inventory.Icon}} "I_PQRL" {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_POISONBOLTS" // "Poison Bolts" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_POISONBOLTS" // "You picked up the poison bolts." States { Spawn: PQRL A -1 Stop } }
